name: tssc-docker-repo
content: import org.sonatype.nexus.blobstore.api.BlobStoreManager; import org.sonatype.nexus.repository.storage.WritePolicy;  repository.createDockerHosted('tssc', 5000, null, BlobStoreManager.DEFAULT_BLOBSTORE_NAME ,false, true, WritePolicy.ALLOW ); log.info('Script dockerRepositories completed successfully')
